semantic_description: Database calls within the CLM service that execute stored procedures should record the procedure name (and optionally the database name) as span attributes so it appears in Jaeger traces.

attributes_to_add.name: db.operation
attributes_to_add.value_source: the stored procedure name extracted from SqlCommand.CommandText (e.g., 'spGetUserProfile')

attributes_to_add.name: db.name
attributes_to_add.value_source: the Database property of the current SqlConnection instance
